title: This is my second time purchasing with…
text: This is my second time purchasing with more purchases to be made! The items ship out quickly and although it takes 2-3 weeks to deliver, it’s totally worth waiting for! Easy to follow the tracking and the most important thing is that Halara is a reliable company.

title: You will not be disappointed!!!
text: Fell in love with the Halara dresses and the great products keep on coming not only am I beyond satisfied with everything I have purchased over the past two years that customer service cannot be beat items sometimes take a little longer than I hope for but that's just me being eager with anticipation for my next addition to the wardrobe! Everything is comfortable, true to size and a great value for the money. The quality and compliments exceeded my expectations every time.

title: I bought two different pairs of the…
text: I bought two different pairs of the stretchy jeans. They are incredible. I have never liked wearing jeans because of how restrictive they are, and now I can wear jeans that I love, that look good, feel good, and I could do anything in them. I’m probably going to buy more.Also my partnered accidentally dried them which normally shrinks all my new stuff. But these didn’t shrink at all.

title: Always a little hesitant to buy online…
text: Always a little hesitant to buy online but I saw many reviews on the leggings and they did not disappoint!  I love them and will be ordering more.  Beautiful fit, and amazing comfort.  Love the fabric!  Great product!!

title: The leggings are good.
text: The leggings were great, I understand why they took long to get to me but it was still a little annoying. They for nice and are true to size. I definitely recommend getting them, I’ll definitely buy more. It’s a really good price compared to LULU. 10/10 recommend. Quality is fabulous.

title: I was skeptical but it’s legit
text: I was skeptical but it’s legit. It’s not Amazon fast, but Halara isn’t Amazon, so don’t expect it to arrive the next day. I love the pants and the stretch of the material. I’ve ordered off of Amazon before for a stretchy and comfortable pant and nothing compares to Halara flex.

title: Love!!!
text: Love my denim skirt! I  always leary of ordering from online retailers… but Halara was great. Great quality, price and fast shipping! I would definitely order again.

title: Very Happy Customer
text: I had a great experience with this site! The website is easy to navigate, and my purchases arrived exactly when promised. The style, material, and fit were just as advertised, and I couldn’t be happier with my order. Highly recommend!

title: Very happy
text: The trousers are very comfortable, and fit perfectly. The only downside of ordering from Halara is the length of time it takes to receive your order, however this time it was with me in just over a week so really happy.

title: my 3rd order went as smooth as the…
text: my 3rd order went as smooth as the other 2, fast shipping, correct merch, nothing to complain about.The Flex Jeans are all super comfy and stylish and I love the Tall options since I am 5.11"

title: Good service
text: I ordered 5 items and had to return 3 of it, because they didn't fit wel. First I had some problems by using the returnsite, but the customer service helped me kindly and quickly to fix it.

title: So comfortable!
text: Package arrived in a timely fashion.  Pants fit wonderfully (except too long but that's almost always the case) and are so comfortable. Love them!

title: Always great customer service
text: Always great customer service. Any time anything hasn’t fit right or the fabric wasn’t what was expected etc., they’ve handled it quickly and in a way that worked for me. I love the clothes and quality and fast customer service.

title: Love my pants!
text: The pants that I ordered are extremely comfortable and fits as expected.  It's made of a great material.  I'm very pleased with my purchase and will probably order again in the future.

title: Best compression leggings and tights on the market.
text: Absolutely the best compression leggings and tights for tummy and butt on the market. Get the softly tummy high rise leggings tights. Buttery soft and you will look amazing!

title: Easy ordering
text: Easy ordering, size guide is good, quality is good too. Very comfortable clothing. I'm in the UK so there is always a bit of a wait for delivery but I plan in advance!

title: Lovely jean/leggings
text: These jeans are so adorable! They fit so well. They really look like jeans, but not having zippers or buttons is so amazing! I have a similar style, but they are lycra, in black, and the length is perfect; I'm not sure why these ones are a little long with tennis shoes. I bought the XS Petite. I'll need to take them to the seamstress. I tried them with boots, and they are OK, but I know that on weekends, I would like to wear them with tennis shoes.

title: Site is easy to use
text: Site is easy to use. Can always find a helpful review from someone my size to be able to order correctly and visualize how someone like me might really look in the clothes!

title: Really happy with the two pairs of…
text: Really happy with the two pairs of trousers I ordered. They are the perfect size and fit, great quality and they look lovely on- both pairs. Will definitely be a returning customer in the future. Great company.

title: Love these stylish, comfy jeans!
text: These jeans are cute, flattering and comfy! Looking forward to wearing them this fall. I had a great experience shopping with this company.

title: I ordered 2 pairs of trousers
text: I ordered 2 pairs of trousers, which didn’t fit well. My return was accepted with no problem and I received my refund promptly. Thank you for the excellent service.

title: My purchasing experience was excellent
text: My purchasing experience was excellent, the app kept me informed about the delivery and the pieces arrived perfect and on time. The clothing fit me perfect, they do a great job.

title: Got my order before expected and…
text: Got my order before expected and everything fit even better than anticipated. I’ve already been getting compliments on my new jeans!

title: Lovely flattering jeans & trousers
text: Fast delivery and absolutely love my jeans and trousers. They are exactly as described - soft and stretchy. They are true to size and the short length is perfect for me - 5’2”. Very flattering style.

title: Love them!!!
text: I loved both styles of pants that I bought!! They fit perfectly and are so comfortable. I’m glad that long sizes are now being offered since most of the regular styles are too short on me. I will definitely buy more!

title: Great Halara shopping
text: I loved the prompt delivery as I had paid for express delivery, and the fit and quality of the garments are excellent! Very happy with my Halara experience.

title: Amazing quality
text: Amazing quality, super flattering on my baby bump! Love this in pregnancy and will be great postpartum.

title: Fast shipping!
text: Shipping was super fast and the quality of my skirt is amazing. Will definitely order from Halara again in the future.

title: I absolutely love all of the different…
text: I absolutely love all of the different pants I have bought.  They fit perfectly and are super comfortable.  I am hooked on Halara!!

title: I’ve bought 4 pairs of the stretchy…p
text: I’ve bought 4 pairs of the stretchy trousers and they are amazing I’ll definitely be ordering again great service and quick delivery

title: Perfect pants for teachers!
text: I absolutely love the Halara 3 button pants.  As a teacher, I need comfortable, classy, and durable dress pants.  These fit the bill and look great!

title: Material and quality is great for price. Comfort but professional/stylish
text: There were plenty of options, styles and colors. Clothes can be dressed up or casual. Delivery was about 2 weeks which is great

title: Great clothing.…
text: This is the 5th garment I have purchased from Halara. I love their products and am looking forward to purchasing more in the future.

title: Loved my pants! Nice surprise
text: You have to wait for the delivery, but it all went smoothly. My pants fit incredible. I sized down 1 size. Beautiful stretchy fabric

title: I have totally enjoyed wearing your…
text: I have totally enjoyed wearing your items as well enjoyed getting compliments on how I look wearing them.

title: Love the pants I ordered
text: Love the pants I ordered! Fit perfectly and look amazing. Can wear them for a professional look for work and casual for a night on the town! Looking to buy more!!

title: Comfy wear
text: Easy ordering, loved the fact that it's a pre order to go against waste.Trousers are so comfy but still stylish

title: Excellent quality fabrics and…
text: Excellent quality fabrics and construction. Great return policy for clothes that did not fit.

title: Trust worthy company
text: The item was shipped timely and with tracking. The pants were exactly what I expected and will purchase more in the future.

text: I really like the style and feel of the clothing. I have a disease where I have to wear clothes that will not irritate my skin and so far the pants that I have ordered are very nice

title: Good company
text: Good company. Good quality products. I’ve ordered several items from them and never had any problems.

text: I loved the product but then only dissatisfaction I had was the time it took for delivery

title: I really like the jeans I ordered
text: I really like the jeans I ordered. You are very prompt on receiving my orders. I just would like to get a return label to mzke a.return easier.

text: Love the pants I ordered! So comfortable and the fit is perfect! I will definitely order again.

title: These jeans are comfortable and fit perfectly.
text: These jeans are comfortable, not too heavy and fit perfectly! My husband says they're sexy on me, too.

title: I really like the fact you make pants…
